vegetarian_snacks.title: Hummus with Veggie Sticks
vegetarian_snacks.description: Creamy chickpea hummus served with fresh carrot, cucumber, and bell pepper sticks. A healthy and flavorful snack option.

vegetarian_snacks.title: Caprese Skewers
vegetarian_snacks.description: Juicy cherry tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves skewered together and drizzled with balsamic glaze. A delightful vegetarian snack bursting with flavor.

vegetarian_snacks.title: Avocado Toast
vegetarian_snacks.description: Sliced ripe avocado on toasted whole grain bread, seasoned with sea salt and red pepper flakes. A trendy and satisfying vegetarian snack option.

vegetarian_snacks.title: Spinach and Feta Quesadillas
vegetarian_snacks.description: Grilled tortillas filled with sautéed spinach, creamy feta cheese, and a hint of garlic. Served with salsa and sour cream on the side.

vegetarian_main_dishes.title: Mushroom Risotto
vegetarian_main_dishes.description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked to perfection with a medley of earthy mushrooms, onions, garlic, and Parmesan cheese. A comforting and satisfying vegetarian main dish.

vegetarian_main_dishes.title: Vegetable Pad Thai
vegetarian_main_dishes.description: Stir-fried rice noodles tossed with an assortment of fresh vegetables, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts, infused with tangy tamarind sauce. A vibrant and flavorful vegetarian main dish inspired by Thai cuisine.

vegetarian_main_dishes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
vegetarian_main_dishes.description: Slices of tender eggplant, breaded and fried to golden perfection, layered with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of spaghetti marinara. A classic Italian-inspired vegetarian main dish.

vegetarian_main_dishes.title: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
vegetarian_main_dishes.description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with a hearty mixture of quinoa, black beans, corn, tomatoes, and spices, topped with melted cheese and baked until tender. A nutritious and flavorful vegetarian main dish.

vegetarian_sides.title: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
vegetarian_sides.description: Creamy mashed potatoes infused with roasted garlic cloves, butter, and cream. A comforting and flavorful vegetarian side dish that pairs perfectly with any main course.

vegetarian_sides.title: Grilled Vegetable Platter
vegetarian_sides.description: An assortment of seasonal vegetables grilled to perfection, including zucchini, bell peppers, mushrooms, and asparagus. Served with a balsamic glaze for dipping. A vibrant and nutritious vegetarian side dish.

vegetarian_sides.title: Quinoa Salad
vegetarian_sides.description: A refreshing salad made with fluffy quinoa, diced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, avocado, and fresh herbs, tossed in a zesty lemon vinaigrette. A light and wholesome vegetarian side dish.

vegetarian_sides.title: Garlic Butter Green Beans
vegetarian_sides.description: Tender green beans sautéed in garlic-infused butter until crisp-tender, seasoned with salt, pepper, and a hint of lemon zest. A simple yet flavorful vegetarian side dish that complements any meal.
